prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a skeletal appearance and a bone club as its weapon.
I want an orange and cream Pokemon that has a spooky vibe and strong bone armor.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon resembling a skull with a unique fighting style and dark colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a warrior with a bone in its hand.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves, using its sharp bones to defend against foes.
Design a unique ghost-type Pokemon that has a fierce battle stance and haunting features.
Show me a Pokemon with a focus on ground attacks and a playful personality.
